headline: "Sensing Hand Interactions with Everyday Objects by Profiling Wrist Topography" by Julius Rudolph, one of my interns at Tactual, et al., was accepted for publication at TEI '22.
I am one of the proud recipients of the Novo Nordisk Foundation's Start Package grants! I will soon be looking for students.
I accepted an assistant professor postion at the University of Copenhagen! Very excited to begin in the HCC section there on September 1.
